column4: Installing things from ppa will not work on my machine? help please?
Why? what error comes up
there is no error, the added source just does not show up after apt-get update
Does this apply to different ppa's or just one
no ppa's show up
if I find it and add it to sources.list then it works
add-apt-repository use that and check
that has been done... the command being add-apt-repository <<ppasource>>
yes
yes, that has been done, and afterwards an apt-get update; hwoever the applied ppa does not show?
what was the last mod you did before it stopped working
I have installled bumblebee, however honestly I do not think it has ever worked; I tried to use it for bumblebee(non-suppported) as well now for the unreleased kernel
go to /etc/apt folder
http://paste.ubuntu.com/655821/
cd sources.list.d/
the "ls" and give output
http://paste.ubuntu.com/655822/
try sudo apt-get update and see if it shows an error

no errors, alot of ign's though
nothing wrong there strange problem, sorry no clue
np, ty for trying
